title: Layoff announcements just hit the highest level since the pandemic
description: Layoff announcements so far this year hit the highest level since 2020, the consulting firm Challenger, Gray & Christmas said.
content: Layoff announcements so far this year have hit the highest level seen since 2020, when the Covid-19 pandemic shut down the U.S. economy, consulting firm Challenger, Gray & Christmas said on Thurs… [+2948 chars]
